title: Two Pointers Pattern
description: Master the two pointers technique for solving array problems efficiently. Learn when and how to use this pattern.

title: Sliding Window Pattern
description: Learn the sliding window technique for substring and subarray problems with optimal time complexity.

title: Dynamic Programming: Memoization and Tabulation
description: Understand DP fundamentals, recursive solutions, memoization, and bottom-up tabulation approach.

title: Backtracking: Exploring All Possibilities
description: Learn backtracking for permutations, combinations, and constraint satisfaction problems.

title: Depth-First Search (DFS) and Traversal
description: Master DFS for graphs and trees, iterative and recursive implementations, and common applications.

title: Breadth-First Search (BFS) and Level-Order Traversal
description: Learn BFS for shortest path, level-order traversal, and queue-based exploration techniques.

title: Binary Search and Search Variations
description: Master binary search, search boundaries, and variations like searching in rotated arrays.

title: Greedy Algorithms: Making Optimal Local Choices
description: Learn greedy approach, when it works, and problems where greedy provides optimal solutions.

title: Union-Find (Disjoint Set Union) Data Structure
description: Understand union-find for cycle detection, connected components, and graph connectivity problems.

title: Topological Sorting: Dependency Resolution
description: Learn topological sorting using DFS and Kahn's algorithm for directed acyclic graphs.
